text: 7 Women, also known as Seven Women, is a 1966 American drama movie. It was directed by John Ford. The movie is based on the short story Chinese Finale by Norah Lofts. Actors in the movie include Anne Bancroft, Margaret Leighton, Flora Robson, Betty Field and Sue Lyon. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn- Mayer.44 == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1966 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by John Ford Category:MGM movies Category:Movies set in the 1930s Category:Movies set in China
title: 7 Women
